unit.name: General of the Empire
unit.description: Equipment: Hand weapon and heavy Armour. Special Rules: Grand General

unit.name: Arch Lector of Sigmar
unit.description: Magic: Level 2 (PM3). Equipment: Hand weapon and light Armour. Special Rules: Magic Resistance (1), Righteous Fury

unit.name: Grand Master
unit.description: Mount: Barded Warhorse. Equipment: Lance, heavy Armour and Shield. Special Rules: Immune to Psychology, Master of Battle, Heavy Cavalry

unit.name: Grand Master of the White Wolves

profile.name: Grand Master of the White Wolves

unit.description: Mount: Barded Warhorse. Equipment: Cavalry Hammer and heavy Armour. Special Rules: Immune to Psychology, Master of Battle

unit.name: Wizard Lord
unit.description: Magic: Level 4 (PM3). Equipment: Hand weapon.

unit.name: Battle Standard
unit.description: Equipment: Hand weapon and light Armour.

unit.name: Captain of the Empire
unit.description: Equipment: Hand weapon and light Armour.

unit.name: Master Engineer
unit.description: Equipment: Hand weapon. Special Rules: Artillery Master, No Leader.

unit.name: Battle Wizard
unit.description: Magic: Level 2 (PM2). Equipment: Hand weapon.

equipment.name: Life BM Master of the Wood (6+)
Heaven PM Second Sign of Amul (5+)

unit.name: Warrior Priest
unit.description: Magic: (PM2). Equipment: Hand weapon and light Armour. Special Rules: Magic Resistance (1), Righteous Fury, Devine Protection

unit.name: Witch Hunter
unit.description: Equipment: Hand weapon and Light armour, Brace of Pistols. Special Rules: Hatred, Magical Attacks, Sniper, Immune to Fear, Witch Hunter

unit.name: Swordsman
unit.description: Equipment: Hand weapon, light armour and shield. Special Rules: State Troops, Block (shield).

unit.name: Detachment Swordsman
unit.description: Equipment: Hand weapon, light armour and shield. Special Rules: State Troops, Block (shield), Expendable.

unit.name: Halberdier
unit.description: Equipment: Halberd, light armour. Special Rules: State Troops, Block (halberd).

unit.name: Detachment Halberdier
unit.description: Equipment: Halberd, light armour. Special Rules: State Troops, Block (halberd), Expendable.

unit.name: Free Company
unit.description: Equipment: Additional hand weapons. Special Rules: Light Infantry, Expendable.

unit.name: Detachment Free Company
unit.description: Equipment: Additional hand weapons. Special Rules: Light Infantry, Expendable.

unit.name: Spearman
unit.description: Equipment: Spear, light armour and shield (or heavy armour, if models have no shields). Special Rules: State Troops, Anti-Cav (spear).

unit.name: Detachment Spearman
unit.description: Equipment: Spear, light armour and shield (or heavy armour, if models have no shields). Special Rules: State Troops, Anti-Cav (spear), Expendable.

unit.name: Pikeman
unit.description: Equipment: Pike, heavy armour. Special Rules: State Troops.

unit.name: Crossbowman
unit.description: Equipment: Crossbows.

unit.name: Detachment Crossbowman
unit.description: Equipment: Crossbows. Special Rules: Expendable.

unit.name: Handgunner
unit.description: Equipment: Handguns.

unit.name: Detachment Handgunner
unit.description: Equipment: Handguns. Special Rules: Expendable.

unit.name: Archer
unit.description: Equipment: Bows. Special Rules: Light Infantry.

unit.name: Detachment Archer
unit.description: Equipment: Bows. Special Rules: Light Infantry, Expendable.

unit.name: Huntsman
unit.description: Equipment: Bows. Special Rules: Skirmish, Scouts.

unit.name: Knight
unit.description: Mount: Barded Warhorse. Equipment: Lance, heavy armour and shield. Special Rules: Heavy Cavalry.

unit.name: Knight of the White Wolf
unit.description: Mount: Barded Warhorse. Equipment: Cavalry Hammer, heavy armour.

unit.name: Greatsword
unit.description: Equipment: Great weapon, heavy armour. Special Rules: State Troops, Stubborn, Block (great weapon)

unit.name: Reiks Guard
unit.description: Equipment: Heavy armour and shield. Special Rules: State Troops, Block (shield), Bodyguard

unit.name: Pistolier
unit.description: Mount: Warhorse. Equipment: Brace of pistols, light armour. Special Rules: Light Cavalry.

unit.name: Outrider
unit.description: Mount: Warhorse. Equipment: Repeater Handgun, light armour. Special Rules: Light Cavalry.

unit.name: Inner Circle Knight
unit.description: Mount: Barded Warhorse. Equipment: Lance, heavy armour and shield. Special Rules: Heavy Cavalry.

unit.name: IC Knight of the White Wolf
unit.description: Mount: Barded Warhorse. Equipment: Cavalry Hammer, heavy armour.

unit.name: Demigryph Knight
unit.description: Mount: Barded Demigryph. Equipment: Lance, heavy armour and shield. Special Rules: Unimpeded, Fear, Heavy Cavalry.

unit.name: Cannon
unit.description: Warmachine: 3 Crewmen. Equipment: Hand weapon. Special Rules: Cannon.

unit.name: Mortar
unit.description: Warmachine: 3 Crewmen. Equipment: Hand weapon. Special Rules: Mortar.

unit.name: Flagellant
unit.description: Equipment: Flails. Special Rules: Unbreakable, Frenzy.

unit.name: Helblaster Volley Gun
unit.description: Warmachine: 3 Crewmen. Equipment: Hand weapon. Special Rules: Helblaster Volley Gun.

unit.name: Helstorm Rocket Battery
unit.description: Warmachine: 3 Crewmen. Equipment: Hand weapon. Special Rules: Helstorm Rocket Battery.

unit.name: Celestial Hurricanum
unit.description: Chariot: 5+AS, 2 Barded Warhorses, 1 Master of Azyr. Equipment: The Master of Azyr is armed with a hand weapon. Special Rules: Impact Hits (D3+1), Celestial Hurricanum .

unit.name: Luminark of Hysh
unit.description: Chariot: 5+AS, 2 Barded Warhorses, 1 Master of Hysh. Equipment: The Master of Hysh is armed with a hand. Special Rules: Impact Hits (D3+1), Luminark of Hysh.

unit.name: Steam Tank
unit.description: Equipment: Main Cannon, Steam Gun, Repeater Pistol. Special Rules: Large Target, Terror, Immune to Psychology, Steam Tank, Unreliable.

unit.name: Steam Tank Conqueror (optional)
unit.description: Equipment: Main Cannon, Steam Gun, Repeater Pistol. Special Rules: Large Target, Terror, Immune to Psychology, Steam Tank.

unit.name: Steam Tank Treuer Kamerad (optional)
unit.description: Equipment: Steam Tank Volley Gun, Steam Gun, Repeater Pistol. Special Rules: Large Target, Terror, Immune to Psychology, Steam Tank.

unit.name: Steam Tank Sigmars Hammer (optional)
unit.description: Equipment: no equipment. Special Rules: Large Target, Terror, Immune to Psychology, Steam Tank.

unit.name: War Wagon
unit.description: Chariot: AS 4+, 6 Defenders, 2 Warhorses. Special Rules: War Wagon, Large Target. Options: each 3 Defenders may be exchanged for a 2 man Canon Crew with a War Wagon Canon. Special Rules: War Wagon, Large Target.

unit.name: Imperial Dwarf
unit.description: Equipment: Spear, light armour and shield. Special Rules: Ally (Imperial Dwarf), Dwarfs, Anti-Cav (spear).

unit.name: Imperial Ogre
unit.description: Equipment: Hand Weapon. Special Rules: Ally (Imperial Ogre), Fear.

unit.name: Halfling
unit.description: Equipment: Bows. Special Rules: Ally (Halfling), Light Infantry.

unit.name: Halfling Hot Pot
unit.description: Warmachine: 3 Halfling Crew. Equipment: Hand weapon. Special Rules: Ally (Halfling), Halfling Hot Pot.

mount.name: Pegasus
mount.description: Equipment: Hand weapon. Special Rules: Flying Model, March Blocker.

mount.name: Griffon
mount.description: Equipment: Hand weapon. Special Rules: Flying Model, Large Target, Terror.

mount.name: War Altar
mount.description: Chariot: 5+AS, 2 Barded Warhorses. Special Rules: Impact Hits (D3+1), Terror, Ward Save (5+), War Altar.

item.name: Aldreds Casket of Sorcery
item.description: At the end of movement the bearer may capture one random spell (BM only) from an enemy wizard within 12". The enemy wizard cannot use the spell until he rolls below or equal to his Magic Level with a D6 at the start of each of his magic phases. The casket can only host one spell at a time, so if a second spell is captured the first is released. When the bearer is killed, all spells are released.

item.name: Armour of Meteoric Iron
item.description: 2+ AS, cannot be further improved. If mounted, does not count as Heavy Cavalry.

item.name: Armour of Right. PM3/5+
Armour of Right. PM2/5+
item.description: Augment, Range 12", target character model gets a Ward Save (5+) until the casters next magic phase

item.name: Armour of Tarnus
item.description: 6+AS, Ward Save (5+)

item.name: Artillery Master
item.description: Instead of shooting in the shooting phase this model may guide one of the following artillery pieces within 3": - Mortar: may reroll Artillery Dice - Cannon: may reroll Artillery Dice on either to hit or bounce - Hellbaster Volley Gun: reroll 1s for to-hit rolls - Helstorm Rocket Battery: reroll 1s for to-hit rolls (Template) If this model is hit by ranged attacks it may transfer hits to a friendly warmachine within 3" on a roll of 4+ per hit. This works like the Look Out Sir! rules

item.name: BM Burning Gaze
item.description: (6+), MM, Range 24", D6 S4 hits, target unit suffers -1BS until the casters next magic phase

item.name: BM Resurrection
item.description: (9+), Augment, Range 18", target unit gets D3 infantry models (US1) or 1 cavalry model (US2) back. Spell only works on unit type infantry and cavalry. Has no effect on character models. Units can only get models back up to the unit size they started the game with. Resurrected command group models return as common models of their unit.

item.name: BM Soulfire
item.description: (5+), All enemy units within 6" of the caster suffer D6 S4 hits

item.name: Banner of Courage
item.description: Immune to Fear and Terror

item.name: Banner of Duty
item.description: Reroll failed rally tests

item.name: Banner of Griffon
item.description: The unit doubles its rank bonus (up to +6CR). This unit cannot pursue/overrun.

item.name: Banner of Sigismund
item.description: Bearer and unit are Stubborn

item.name: Banner of Steel
item.description: +D3" charge range

item.name: Banner of Ulric
item.description: Unit causes Fear

item.name: Banner of Valour
item.description: Immune to Panic

item.name: Beast BM Howl of the Beast (8+)
item.description: RIP, enemy units gain no benefit from Inspiring Presence and Hold Your Ground!

item.name: Beast BM Hunters Spear (9+)
item.description: MM, Range 24", 1 hit like bolt thrower (S6, no AS, D3 wounds, penetrates ranks)

item.name: Beast BM The Beast Cowers (9+)
Beast BM The Beast Cowers (8+)
item.description: BM The Beast Cowers (9+): Hex, Range 24". Target unit halves its M (including mounts). Flyers have to use their ground movement but do not half their M. Target unit cannot declare a charge or charge even if it would be forced to (e.g. because of Frenzy). Units with Random Movement stop 1"in front of enemy units. Further, the target unit suffers -1 for to-hit rolls in cc. Lasts until the casters next magic phase. The spell has no effect on Infantry (Type Inf).

item.name: Beast BM The Crows Feast (6+)
item.description: MM, Range 24", 2D6 S3 hits

item.name: Beast BM The Wolf Hunts (10+)
Shadow BM Unseen Lurker (10+)
item.description: Augment, Range 12". +Choose a point within line of sight of the target unit. The unit then moves up to 2D6" in the direction of that point (use the shortest path; the unit has to wheel and does not have to stop when it reaches the point, i.e. it can continue to move straight ahead). The unit is affected by terrain as normal. If it comes into contact with a unit or impassable terrain the unit stops 1" in front of it. +In addition the unit gets +2M until the casters next magic phase. +Each unit may only benefit from this spell once per magic phase.

item.name: Beast BM Vermin Tide (7+)
item.description: Magic Vortex. Place 3" template touching the caster then move the template 4D6" in any direction in the casters front arc. Every unit touched by the template (except caster) suffers 3D6 S2 hits.

item.name: Beast PM Dark Fury (5+)
item.description: Augment, Range 18", unit rerolls towound rolls of natural 1s until the casters next magic phase.

item.name: Beast PM The Bears Anger (4+)
item.description: Augment, Range 18", target character model with US1 gains +2A, +1S and +1T until the casters next magic phase. A model under the effect of this spell cannot use any weapons or shields.

item.name: Beast PM The Oxen Stands (5+)
item.description: Augment, Range 72". Target friendly broken unit immediately rallies, even if below 25%.

item.name: Brace of pistols
item.description: 8", S4, AP (1), Multiple shots (2), no penalty for moving and shooting as well as long range; may always stand and shoot, even if the enemy is within half charge distance.

item.name: Bronze Shield
item.description: Shield, bearer ignores first hit (cc or shooting) suffered in battle.

item.name: Cannon
item.description: Cannon, Range 60", S10, no AS, D3 wounds

item.name: Cavalry Hammer
Cavalry Hammers (replacement of Lance)
item.description: two handed weapon, +2S when charging, +1S otherwise

item.name: Celestial Hurricanum
item.description: - This model may attempt to dispel spells as if it was a wizard. - The casting values of lore of heaven spells of friendly wizards within 12" of this model are reduced by one. This effect is not cumulative. - This model may cast the following spell: Celestial Barrier (PM 2/5+): Augment, self, all friendly units within 12" get a Ward Save (5+) vs ranged attacks (incl. magic missiles) made from more than 12" away from the Celestial Hurricanum. Lasts until this models next magic phase. Devine Protection: Warrior Priests allow a player to dispel spells even though they are not Wizards.

item.name: Celestial Hurricanum rules
item.description: - This model may attempt to dispel spells as if it was a wizard. - The casting values of lore of heaven spells of friendly wizards within 12" of this model are reduced by one. This effect is not cumulative. - This model may cast the following spell: Celestial Barrier (PM 2/5+): Augment, self, all friendly units within 12" get a Ward Save (5+) vs ranged attacks (incl. magic missiles) made from more than 12" away from the Celestial Hurricanum. Lasts until this models next magic phase.

item.name: Crimson Amulet
item.description: Ward Save (5+), bearer automatically passes all characteristic tests (except Ld)

item.name: Crystal Ball
item.description: Enemy must reveal all secrets (i.e. magic items, hidden models, etc.) within 24" of the bearer at any time.

item.name: Dawn Armour
item.description: 5+AS, reroll failed AS

item.name: Death BM Dark Hand of Death (5+)
Fire BM Fire Ball (5+)
item.description: MM, Range 24", D6 S4 hits

item.name: Death BM Doom and Darkness (9+)
item.description: Hex, Range 24", target unit suffers a -3 modifier on all Ld based tests until casters next magic phase.

item.name: Death BM Soultaker (7+)
item.description: Target one enemy unit within 12", the unit suffers 1 wound with no AS, allocated like shooting. The caster gains 1 wound (up to a max. of double its original W) if the target lost the wound, i.e. wounds saved with ward saves cannot be drained but wounds regained by regeneration are eligible.

item.name: Death BM Walking Death (6+)
item.description: Augment, Range 18", unit causes Fear. If it already causes Fear, unit causes Terror instead. Lasts until casters next magic phase

item.name: Death BM Wind of Death (9+)
Metal BM Destillation of Molten Silver (9+)
Fire BM Fiery Blast (9+)
item.description: MM, Range 24", 2D6 S4 hits

item.name: Death BM Wither (8+)
item.description: Hex, Range 18", target unit suffers -1T and -1I until the start of the casters next magic phase.

item.name: Death PM Deathwish (5+)
item.description: Augment, Range 18", target unit becomes Immune to Fear, Terror and Panic until the casters next magic phase.

item.name: Death PM Fate of Death (5+)
item.description: Augment, Range 18", target unit gets KB in cc. If the unit already has KB then the KB is improved to work on a 5+. Lasts until the casters next magic phase.

item.name: Dispel Scroll
item.description: Automatically dispels one spell without the need of DD. One use only.

item.name: Doomfire Ring
item.description: PM 2/7+, MM, Range 18", D6 S3 hits

item.name: Dragon Bow
item.description: Bow, Range 36", S6

item.name: Dwarf
Dwarfs
item.description: - Dwarfen Magic Resistance: Enemy spells that target Dwarfen units suffer -1 to the casting roll. - Hatred (Greenskins): All Dwarfs hate all kind of Greenskins. - Relentless: All Dwarfs are allowed to march even when an enemy unit is within march blocking range (usually within 8").

item.name: Enchanted Shield
item.description: Shield that grants +2 AS

item.name: Expendable
item.description: This unit does not cause panic in friendly units, unless they are Expendable themselves

item.name: Fire BM Ash Storm (8+)
item.description: Hex, Range 24", target unit suffers - 1M, -1WS, -1BS and -1I until the casters next magic phase.

item.name: Fire BM Breath of Embers (8+)
item.description: Place the tear drop template touching the caster in its front arc and determine hits using the template rules. All models hit suffer a S4 hit. If the caster is in cc, select one enemy unit that is in btb with the caster, this unit suffers D6 S4 hits.

item.name: Fire BM Burning Head (8+)
item.description: Choose a point in the front arc of the caster then draw a straight 18” long line from the caster to that point. The burning head flies along this line until it reaches its end or hits impassable LOS blocking terrain. All models under the line (affected models are determined in the same way as for a cannonball) suffer a S4 hit. Units that suffer at least one casualty have to take a panic test. Cannot be used if the caster, or the unit he is with, is engaged in cc.

item.name: Fire BM Wall of Fire (11+)
item.description: Direct Damage, Range 24", all hits are resolved with S4. Place a template of the size of the unit (or just a marker) on the unit. All models in the front rank have to test if they are hit by the template, Skirmishers suffer D3 hits instead. The spell lasts until the casters next magic phase. If the unit wants to move before the spells ends, it has to pass a Ld test or has to remain stationary. If the unit is forced to move (e.g. has to flee) or is Immune to Psychology it automatically passes the test. When the unit moves all models in the unit have to test if they are hit by the template and the spells ends after any hits have been resolved.

item.name: Fire PM Aqshys Blessing (5+)
item.description: Augment, Range 18”, target warmachine (Type: WarM) gets the special rule ‘Devestating’ for ranged attacks until the caster’s next magic phase. Devastating: Units that suffer one or more casualties from this attack must pass a panic test.

item.name: Fire PM Blazing Flames (7+)
item.description: Augment, Range 18". Units shooting at the target unit suffer -1BS (to a minimum of 0) for this attack. In addition each enemy model in BTB with the target unit receives a S3 hit in each players magic phase including the magic phase the spell is cast. Lasts until the casters next magic phase.

item.name: Fire PM Flaming Sword of Rhuin (5+)
item.description: Augment, Range 18", target unit gets +1 to to-hit rolls in cc until the casters next magic phase.

item.name: Gilded Armour
item.description: 5+AS, Heavy Armour, Attacker must pass a Strength test for each cc attack or the attack fails.

item.name: Grand General
item.description: If this model is the general of the army, its range for Inspiring Presence is 18".

item.name: Grenade Launching Blunderb.
item.description: Range 18", S6, AP(1), move or fire

item.name: Grey Wand
item.description: +1 to cast (BM and PM)

item.name: Halfling Hot Pot
item.description: Catapult, Range 6"-36", 3" Template, S3(3), AP (3).

item.name: Hammer of Judgement
item.description: A model must pass a Toughness test for every hit inflicted by this weapon. If failed, the hit wounds automatically and allows no AS. If passed, resolve the hit as usual.

item.name: Hammer of Sigmar PM3/5+
Hammer of Sigmar PM2/5+
item.description: Augment, Range 12", unit gets +1 to to-wound rolls in cc until the casters next magic phase

item.name: Healing Hand PM3/5+
Healing Hand PM2/5+
item.description: Augment, Range 12", target character model recovers one wound (up to starting amount)

item.name: Heaven BM Blizzard (8+)
item.description: Hex, Range 36", target unit suffers -1BS and -1WS as well as -1 to all Ld based tests until the casters next magic phase.

item.name: Heaven BM Comet of Casandora (12+)
item.description: Direct Damage, Range 36". Place the center of the 3" template over a target unit within 36". If the target unit is not Immune to Psychologie, it has the option to become broken and immediately flee (2D6"/3D6") directly towards the nearest table edge. Any model hit by the template (see Templates in core rules) suffers a S5 hit, allocated like shooting.

item.name: Heaven BM Forked Lightning (6+)
item.description: MM, Range 36", D6 S4 hits

item.name: Heaven BM Portent of Far (5+)
item.description: Augment, Range 18", target unit rerolls natural 1s for to-hit and to-wound rolls until the casters next magic phase.

item.name: Heaven BM Tornado (12+)
item.description: Hex, Range 24". Target unit is immediately moved D3+1 directly away from the caster and is turned to face in a random direction (determined by the Scatter Dice). If the unit contacts impassable terrain, the board edge or a unit it stops 1" in front of the obstacle.

item.name: Heaven BM Uranons Thunder Bolt (8+)
item.description: MM, Range 24", D6 S4 hits, noAS

item.name: Heaven PM Celestial Shield (5+)
Death PM Shroud of Darkness (5+)
item.description: Augment, Range 18", 5+ Ward Save vs ranged attacks and spells until the casters next magic phase. Has no effect on character models.

item.name: Heaven PM Clairvoyance (3+)
item.description: Target one unit on the board. Your opponent has to reveal any hidden models and magic items (but not which model has them) in that unit.

item.name: Heaven PM Second Sign of Amul (5+)
item.description: The player gets D3 rerolls. Each reroll can be used to reroll one to-hit roll, to-wound roll, armour save, ward save or regeneration roll. Any rerolls not used at the end of the players turn are wasted.

item.name: Helblaster Volley Gun
item.description: Range 24", S4 (S5 short range) AP(1), Multiple Shots (X).

item.name: Helstorm Rocket Battery
item.description: Catapult, Range 12"-60", 5" Template, S4(8), no AS, D3 wounds. If the Artillery Dice shows a result of 2 or 4, reroll the Artillery Dice. Misfire: Roll a D6: 1-2: destroyed, 3-4: the warmachine doesnt shoot this turn as well as the next, 5-6: the warmachine doesnt shoot this turn.

item.name: Hochland Long Rifle
Hochland Long Rifle (Champ)
item.description: Range 36", S4, AP(1), Sniper, move or fire

item.name: Holy Relic
item.description: Ward Save (4+)

item.name: Icon of Magnus
item.description: Bearer and unit is Immune to Fear.

item.name: Imperial Banner
item.description: Units within 12" reroll failed psychology tests

item.name: Jade Amulet
item.description: The first time in the game, the bearer suffers one or more wounds (after saves), reduce the number of wounds suffered by 1 (down to a minimum of 0). The wound saved in this way does not count towards combat resolution.

item.name: Laurels of Victory
item.description: Each wound the bearer (not his mount) inflicts counts as 2CR.

item.name: Life BM Gift of Life (7+)
item.description: Augment, Range 18". Target model regains all lost wounds. In case of ridden monsters (/chariot) choose either the monster or its rider as the target.

item.name: Life BM Master of the Wood (6+)
item.description: MM, Range 24", D6 S4 AP(1) hits

item.name: Life BM Plague (11+)
item.description: Hex, Range 24", RIP, When the spell is successfully cast as well as at the start of each players magic phase the target suffers D6 S3 no AS hits.

item.name: Life BM Regrowth (9+)
item.description: Augment, Range 18", unit gains Regeneration (4+) until the casters next magic phase.

item.name: Life BM Strangle Root Curse (8+)
item.description: Hex, Range 24", target unit suffers -1M, -1WS, -1BS and -1I until the casters next magic phase.

item.name: Life BM Undergrowth (7+)
item.description: Hex or Augment, Range 18", target unit counts as being in difficult terrain and light cover until the casters next magic phase.

item.name: Life PM Flesh of Stone (6+)
item.description: Augment, Range 18", unit gets +1T until the casters next magic phase. Has no effect on character models.

item.name: Life PM Toxic Gift (5+)
item.description: Augment, Range 18", unit gets Poisoned Attacks (1) (cc as well as shooting), until the casters next magic phase. If the unit already has Poisoned Attacks, increase its value by +1. Has no effect on magic items.

item.name: Life PM Wall of Vines (5+)
item.description: Augment, Range 18", unit counts as defending a fence (on all sides). Lasts until the start of the casters next magic phase.

item.name: Light BM Burning Gaze (6+)
item.description: MM, Range 24", D6 S4 hits, target unit suffers -1BS until the casters next magic phase

item.name: Light BM Cleansing Flare (10+)
item.description: Each enemy unit within 12" suffers D6 S5 hits.

item.name: Light BM Dazzling Brightness (6+)
Shadow BM Phantasmagoria (6+)
item.description: Hex, Range 18", target unit suffers -2WS (to a minimum of 1) until the casters next magic phase.

item.name: Light BM Guardian Light (9+)
item.description: Augment, Range 12". Target unit becomes Stubborn and Immune to Psychology until the casters next magic phase. If target unit is broken it immediately rallies instead, even if below 25%.

item.name: Light BM Phas Illumination (6+)
item.description: Hex, Range 24". Units that attack the target unit with ranged attacks reroll failed to hit rolls. Lasts until the end of turn.

item.name: Light BM Resurrection (9+)
item.description: Augment, Range 18", target unit gets D3 infantry models (US1) or 1 cavalry model (US2) back. Spell only works on unit type infantry and cavalry. Has no effect on character models. Units can only get models back up to the unit size they started the game with. Resurrected command group models return as common models of their unit.

item.name: Light PM Cure (7+)
item.description: Augment, Range 18", target model recovers one wound

item.name: Light PM Shield of Light (5+)
item.description: Augment, Range 18", unit gets a Ward Save (5+) until next casters magic phase. Has no effect on character models.

item.name: Light PM Speed of Light (5+)
item.description: Augment, Range 12", unit gets +2M and +2I until the casters next magic phase.

item.name: Luckstone
item.description: Reroll one dice used to cast or dispel (BM or PM). Can prevent miscasts and cause irresistible force. One use only.

item.name: Luminark of Hysh
item.description: - This model may attempt to dispel spells as if it was a wizard. - The casting values of lore of light spells of friendly wizards within 12" of this model are reduced by one. This effect is not cumulative. - This model may cast the following spell: Solar Flare (PM 2/5+): MM, Range 24", D3 S4 hits, target unit suffers -1BS and -1WS until this models next magic phase. Master of Battle: If this model joins a unit, the unit gains Immune to Psychology

item.name: Luminark of Hysh rules
item.description: - This model may attempt to dispel spells as if it was a wizard. - The casting values of lore of light spells of friendly wizards within 12" of this model are reduced by one. This effect is not cumulative. - This model may cast the following spell: Solar Flare (PM 2/5+): MM, Range 24", D3 S4 hits, target unit suffers -1BS and -1WS until this models next magic phase.

item.name: Master of Battle
item.description: If this model joins a unit, the unit gains Immune to Psychology

item.name: Metal BM Commandment of Brass (6+)
item.description: Hex, Range 36", target Warmachine or Chariot may not move (other than to flee) or shoot until the end of its next turn.

item.name: Metal BM Law of Gold (8+)
item.description: Hex, Range 24", the player of the target unit has to nominate a magic item that is carried by any model in that unit, then roll a D6: 1-3 the magic item cannot be used until the casters next magic phase, 4-6 the magic item cannot be used for the rest of the game.

item.name: Metal BM Rule of Burning Iron (6+)
item.description: MM, Range 24", D6 S3 hits, no AS

item.name: Metal BM Spirit of the Forge (9+)
item.description: Augment, Range 18", unit rerolls failed armour saves until the casters next magic phase.

item.name: Metal BM Transmutation of Lead (7+)
item.description: Hex, Range 24", target unit suffers -1 to-hit and -1 to-wound in cc as well as -1AS until the casters next magic phase.

item.name: Metal PM Commandment of Steel (5+)
item.description: Augment, Range 18", unit gets AP(1) (cc as well as shooting), until the casters next magic phase. Has no effect on magic items.

item.name: Metal PM Forge Fire (5+)
item.description: Augment, Misfires of friendly warmachines within 12" have no effect other than that the warmachine does not shoot. Lasts until the casters next magic phase.

item.name: Metal PM Iron Skin (5+)
item.description: Augment, all friendly units within 6" of the caster gain Scaly Skin (6+). Lasts until the casters next magic phase.

item.name: Mortar
item.description: Catapult, Range 12"-60", 5" Template, S3(6), AP (1).

item.name: No Leader
item.description: This model may never be the army general. Also units cannot use this models Ld for Ld-tests and this model does not allow a unit to rally below 25%.

item.name: Parent Unit
item.description: Units is a parent unit and must have 1-2 detachments.

item.name: Pigeon Bombs
item.description: Range 24", 3" Template, S4, move or fire, no stand and shoot.

item.name: Power Stone
item.description: +2PD to cast a spell. Dice used may exceed maximum allowed by level. One use only.

item.name: Repeater Handgun
Repeater Handgun (Champ)
item.description: Range 24", S4, AP(1), move or fire, Multiple Shots (3)

item.name: Repeater Pistol
Repeater Pistol (Champ)
item.description: Range 8", S4, AP(1), Multiple Shots (3), no penalty for moving and shooting as well as long range; may always stand and shoot, even if the enemy is within half charge distance.

item.name: Righteous Fury
item.description: The model and any unit joined by the model hate all enemy models. Has no effect on (other) character models in the unit.

item.name: Rod of Command
item.description: Bearer and unit automatically pass first break test. Cannot be used in a turn the bearer refused a challenge. One use only.

item.name: Rod of Power
item.description: Allows the bearer to save one unused PD or DD of his pool in each magic phase. At the start of the next magic phase roll a D6: on a 4+ the die can be used in this magic phase, on a 1-3 the die is lost.

item.name: Runefang
item.description: All hits automatically wound, no AS allowed.

item.name: Seal of Destruction
item.description: Dispel Scroll. On a 4+ BM / 5+ PM the spell is destroyed. One use only.

item.name: Shadow BM Crown of Taidron (8+)
item.description: Each unit (friend or foe) within 12" suffers D6 S4 hits.

item.name: Shadow BM Pit of Shades (12+)
item.description: Direct Damage, Range 24", place the center of the 3" template within 24", for each hit (see Templates in core rules) the unit suffers a S4 hit, allocated like shooting. A unit that suffers at least one casualty halves its movement value until the casters next magic phase.

item.name: Shadow BM Shades of Death (6+)
item.description: Augment, Range 18", unit causes Fear. If it already causes Fear, unit causes Terror instead. Lasts until casters next magic phase.

item.name: Shadow BM Unnerving Whispers (8+)
item.description: Hex, Range 18", needs LOS, target unit must take a panic test (Units that are Immune to Psychology are immune to this spell).

item.name: Shadow PM Creeping Shadows (5+)
item.description: Hex, Range 24", target unit cannot march until the casters next magic phase.

item.name: Shadow PM Shadow Mist (6+)
item.description: Augment, Range 18", 5+ Ward Save vs cc attacks until the casters next magic phase. Has no effect on character models.

item.name: Shadow PM Steed of Shadows (4+)
item.description: Augment, cast on itself or friendly character model on foot with US1 (in both cases) within 12", model may immediately make a 20" fly movement. This move can be used to leave cc but cannot be used to enter combat (i.e. charging is not possible).

item.name: Shield of the Gorgon
item.description: Shield, one model in BtB loses 1A until the end of turn (bearers choice)

item.name: Shroud of Magnus
item.description: Ward Save (5+), MR2

item.name: Sigil of Sigmar
item.description: MR1

item.name: Staff of Sorcery
item.description: +1 to total roll to attempt to dispel a spell.

item.name: Standard of Arcane Warding
item.description: MR2

item.name: Steam Tank
item.description:
The Steam Tank is a chariot with the following special rules:
• Immune to the effects of Poisoned Attacks and any spell effects that do no damage (e.g. buffs/de-buffs)
• Instability (Even though the Steam Tank is not a daemon, there is a risk that it gets damaged or overwhelmed when it loses combat.)

Generate Steam:
• At start of each own turn the Steam Tank has to generate 0 to 5 Steam Points (SP).
• Roll a D6 for each SP generated: for each roll that is lower than the number of SP generated, the Steam Tank suffers a S7 hit.

SP can be used for:
Movement:
• 1 SP: Move 3"
Fire Main Cannon:
• 2 SP: Cannon, Range 24", S6, no grapeshot option
• 3 SP: Cannon, Range 36", S8, D3 wounds, no grapeshot option
• 1 SP: Volley Gun, (1 artillery dice), range 24“, S4, AP (2) in short range, AP(1) in long range
Misfire (for all main guns): roll a D6:
• 1: Main Cannon is destroyed and the Steam Tank suffers D3 wounds
• 2-3: does not shoot this turn and cannot shoot next turn
• 4-6: does not shoot this turn
Fire Steam Gun:
• 1 SP: Breath weapon, S3, AP(2)
• 2 SP: Breath weapon, S4, AP(2)

Moving:
• The Steam Tank can move up to 3" for each SP used for Movement.
• The model can move over (through) linear obstacles without suffering damage.

Charging:
• A Steam Tank can declare a charge as usual. If successful, the Steam Tank inflicts Impact Hits (D3 + 1/2 * the number of SP used for Movement rounding up) INSTEAD of doing regular attacks in the first combat phase. If the charge fails, the Steam Tank moves its full distance.

Shooting:
• If the Steam Tank is not in cc, it can fire once with either its Main Cannon or its Steam Gun. In addition the Tank Commander can shoot with his Repeater Pistol.
• The Steam Gun and the Repeater Pistol have a 360° AOS and can shoot all around.
• Even if the model did not spend any SP for movement, it is allowed to pivot before shooting.
• Stand & Shoot: Only the Repeater Pistol can be used to Stand & Shoot and only against charges to the front.

Close Combat
• In cc the Steam Tank has a number of attacks equal to D3 + the number of SP generated last time. Roll at the start of each combat phase.
• Its pursue and overrun distance depends on the number of SP generated last time: 0-3 SP: 2D6", 4-5 SP: 3D6".

item.name: Sword of Righteous Steel
item.description: Hits on 2+, cannot be modified

item.name: Sword of Sigismund
item.description: +1S, ASF

item.name: The Orb of Thunder
item.description: PM 2/7+, Flyers using their fly movement move at half speed. Effect lasts until the casters next magic phase.

item.name: The Silver Horn
item.description: PM3/5+. All friendly broken units rally immediately, even if below 25%.

item.name: Unbending Right. PM3/7+
Unbending Right. PM2/7+
item.description: Augment, caster and his unit become Stubborn until the casters next magic phase

item.name: Unimpeded
item.description: Demigryphs do not suffer -1M from barding.

item.name: Unreliable
item.description: This unit has to roll on its misfire chart if it suffers a misfire.

item.name: Van Horstmans Speculum
item.description: At the start of each combat phase the bearer may switch one of the following stats with his opponent for this combat phase: WS, S, T, I, A. Can only be used if the bearer fights in a challenge.

item.name: War Altar
item.description: The War Altar is a Chariot which grants the Arch Lector following special rules: - Ward Save (5+) - Stubborn - Immune to Psychology - Righteous Fury affects all friendly units within 6" - The following spells are bound in the War Altar. The Arch Lector may cast one of these spells in each magic phase. These spells cannot be lost through a miscast. - Dazzling Brightness PM3/6+: Hex, Range 18", target unit suffers -2WS (to a minimum of 1) until the casters next magic phase. - Karus Light of Confidence PM3/5+: Augment. All friendly units within 12" are Immune to Psychology until the casters next magic phase. In addition, all friendly broken units rally immediately, even if below 25%. - Sigmars Wrath PM3/4+: MM, Range 18", D6 S3 AP(1) hits

item.name: War Banner
item.description: +1CR

item.name: War Wagon
item.description: - Movement - War Wagons cannot declare charges (or charge). - Shooting - Defenders may fire their handguns even when the War Wagon moved (but suffer the -1 to-hit penalty for moving and shooting). - War Wagons have an AOS of 360 degree. - Each War Wagon Canon may always shoot at a different target than other parts of the War Wagon. - Close Combat - War Wagons count as defending an obstacle for cavalry and monstrous cavalry. - Rank bonuses of enemy units fighting solely against War Wagons are ignored for combat result. - Enemies fighting a War Wagon in cc do not gain bonuses for fighting in its flank or rear. - If a War Wagon fails its break test, it is destroyed. - Enemy units fighting solely against War Wagons cannot pursue (or overrun). - War Wagons pursue 1D6" and always have to stop 1" in front of units they would contact during the pursuit. - Psychology - If a War Wagon fails a panic test, it does not flee, but instead is not allowed to fire the next turn.

item.name: War Wagon Canon
1x War Wagon Canon
2x War Wagon Canons
item.description: War Wagon Canon: Range 36", S5, no AS, D3 wounds, penetrates ranks, no "Stand & Shoot".

item.name: Witch Hunter
item.description: Wounds caused by a Witch Hunter ignore ward saves. The models nominates an enemy character. The Witch Hunter gains the Killing Blow special rule when attacking this model.

item.name: Wizards Staff
item.description: Bearer may use one more PD to cast spells than his level allows (BM only).

item.name: Wyrmslayer Sword
item.description: Hits wound on 4+ or lower. AS modification as per strength of the bearer. Ignores Scaly Skin of Large Targets.

rule.leftTerm: Heaven PM Second Sign of Amul (5+)

rule.leftTerm: Beast BM Howl of the Beast (8+)

rule.leftTerm: Death BM Dark Hand of Death (5+)

rule.name: E#77
rule.leftTerm: Fire PM Flaming Sword of Rhuin (5+)

rule.name: E#89
rule.leftTerm: Metal BM Destillation of Molten Silver (9+)

rule.name: E#91
rule.leftTerm: Metal BM Rule of Burning Iron (6+)

rule.leftTerm: Metal BM Spirit of the Forge (9+)
